src:
Costco Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First Deals
05 Nov 2019 by Gordon Kelly
Costco’s Black Friday ad has leaked and it reveals some major surprises, particularly on smartphones where Costco looks to have the best Galaxy S10, Note 10 deal of any store. This is a huge step up from its weak showing last year and now Costco has gone a step further because its first Black Friday deals are live. Note: you can find my Black Friday 2019 guides to the current live sales from Amazon (here), from Best Buy (here), from Target (here) and from Walmart (here). I have also done roundups of the best live Apple deals and biggest Samsung savings.


Costco's Black Friday 2019 deals are now liveCosMIKE MOZART


Best Buy Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First DealsForbes Gordon Kelly


Costco Black Friday 2019: Best Current Live Sales 


Samsung 65-inch Class - Q7D Series - 4K UHD QLED LCD TV - $1,199.99 (limited time deal) - shop deal now
Samsung 55-inch Class - Q6D Series - 4K UHD QLED LCD TV - $699.99 (while supplies last) - shop deal now
New Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-inch with Touch Bar - Intel Core i5 - 8GB Memory - 128GB SSD - Silver - $999.99 (save $250) - while stocks last - shop deal now



Costco Black Friday MacBook sales are live nowCostco


Samsung 15-inch Notebook - Intel Core i7 - 1080p, $1,229.99 (save $170) - member only item - shop deal now
Dell XPS 13 2-in-1 Touchscreen - 10th Gen Intel Core i7-1065G7, 4K Ultra HD - $1,699.99 (save $300) while supplies last - shop deal now
Dell Inspiron 24 5000 Series Touchscreen All-in-One Desktop - 10th Gen Intel Core i5 -1080p - $649.99 (save $200) - shop deal now
Dell Inspiron 14 5000 Series 2-in-1 Touchscreen Laptop - AMD Ryzen 5 - 1080p - $399 (save $200) - shop deal now
HP Omen 880 Gaming Desktop - Intel Core i7 - GeForce GTX 1050 Ti - $999.99 (save $300) - shop deal now

Yes, Costco is serious about Black Friday 2019 and these deals will prove to be just the tip of the iceberg with the aforementioned killer Galaxy S10/Note 10 deal set to be the highlight of Black Friday. Where Costco differentiates, it the amount of deals on products from premium brands compared to the likes of Amazon, in particular, which is pushing a lot of very cheap TV deals from obscure brands.
One area where Costco shoppers need to be careful, however, is shipping. The company is offering slower shipping than most rivals and you will need to be a member to get access to the very top sales. 
Note: I’ve picked out my top Costco TV deals, but the store also has a wide range of time-limited sale which are live now. 


Costco has a wide range of Black Friday TV salesCostco

If you’d like to shop more Black Friday deals right now, check out my guides to Amazon’s early live deals, Best Buy’s live deals, Walmart’s live deals and my roundups of the best Apple deals and biggest Samsung savings you can capitalise on today. 






I will be extensively tracking Black Friday and Cyber Monday 2019 deals and publishing the best offers daily, so be sure to bookmark my page.
___
Follow Gordon on Twitter and Facebook 

More of my Black Friday Guides on Forbes
